title: User login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with correct username/email and password and is redirected based on their assigned role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click on the login button
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard according to their role

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Ensure login fails gracefully when invalid username/email or password is entered and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email and/or password
Click on the login button
Verify login is unsuccessful and correct error message is shown

title: Role-based access restriction enforcement
description: Verify that users are restricted from accessing routes and pages not permitted by their roles, and appropriate access denied messages or redirects occur.

steps.description: Log in as user with limited role (e.g., client)
Attempt to access admin-only pages such as User Management, Impact Models Admin
Confirm access is denied or redirected and appropriate message is displayed
Repeat for manager and admin roles to verify restrictions for super_admin and unauthorized routes

title: Create new advertising proposal via wizard - happy path
description: Test the creation of a new advertising proposal using the guided wizard, verifying input validation, step progression, data saving, and PDF generation success.

steps.description: Navigate to the New Proposal page
Fill in all mandatory fields for step 1 and advance to next step
Complete all subsequent wizard steps providing valid data and proceed through them
Submit the proposal at the final step
Validate proposal is saved successfully in the database
Generate PDF for the created proposal
Verify the generated PDF matches the required layout and contains correct data

title: Proposal wizard prevents advancing on missing mandatory fields
description: Verify that the wizard does not allow proceeding to next steps if mandatory fields are incomplete or contain invalid data.

steps.description: Navigate to the New Proposal wizard
Leave one or more mandatory fields empty or enter invalid data on current step
Attempt to advance to the next step
Confirm wizard prevents moving forward and displays relevant validation messages

title: Create and edit campaigns and link venues
description: Verify manager-level user can create new advertising campaigns, edit existing ones, and successfully link venues to campaigns with proper validation.

steps.description: Log in as manager
Navigate to the Campaigns page and create a new campaign with valid details
Validate campaign is created and listed
Edit the newly created campaign details
Confirm edited changes are saved and displayed correctly
Navigate to Venues page and link one or more venues to the campaign
Verify venues are associated properly with the campaign

title: Inventory screen image upload with validation
description: Validate that inventory managers can upload screen images, and the system enforces file type and size restrictions with appropriate error handling.

steps.description: Login as inventory manager
Navigate to Inventory page and attempt to upload an image file within allowed size and format
Verify the image uploads successfully and is displayed
Attempt to upload an unsupported file type or file exceeding size limits
Validate the system displays appropriate error messages and does not accept the file

title: Interactive map loads with geospatial points and heatmap rendering
description: Verify that the interactive maps load correctly with displayed geospatial points and heatmap layers, and that filters apply properly to the data visualizations.

steps.description: Navigate to Interactive Map page
Confirm the map loads and displays geospatial points accurately
Enable heatmap layer on the map
Verify that heatmap renders aggregated data correctly
Apply various filters on map data (e.g., by venue, campaign)
Validate the points and heatmap update according to filters

title: Generate reports with filters and export to PDF
description: Check that users can apply filters on report data, generate reports accordingly, and export the reports as PDFs maintaining correct formatting and data.

steps.description: Navigate to Reports page
Apply filters such as date range, campaign, and venue
Verify that report data matches the filter criteria
Export the report to PDF format
Confirm the generated PDF file opens without error and matches the expected layout and data

title: User profile update and password change validation
description: Ensure users can update their profile details and change their password with all validations enforced, and that changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Log in as a normal user
Navigate to Profile page
Update profile fields such as name, email with valid data and save
Verify that the profile updates are saved and reflected correctly
Attempt to change password with mismatched confirmation or invalid strength
Validate appropriate error messages prevent password change
Change password with valid current password, matching new password and confirmation
Confirm password change success and subsequent login with new password

title: Manage agencies, projects, and associating people
description: Validate creation, editing, and association workflows for agencies, projects, and people by authorized users.

steps.description: Log in as admin or manager
Navigate to Agencies page and add a new agency with valid details
Verify the agency is created and listed
Navigate to Projects management and create a new project linked to the agency
Confirm project creation and linkage to agency
Assign people to projects with proper role assignments
Validate people are correctly associated with projects

title: Dashboard data visualization and live data refresh
description: Check that the dashboard loads key business metrics accurately and performs live backend data refresh without errors or UI glitches.

steps.description: Access the dashboard page after login
Verify all key metrics are displayed correctly according to backend data
Observe dashboard data refresh cycle
Confirm live data refresh updates the dashboard real-time without errors or UI breaks

title: Email notification system sends transactional emails
description: Verify that triggered transactional emails (e.g., proposal submission confirmation, password change alerts) are generated and sent properly.

steps.description: Perform an action that triggers an email notification, such as submitting a new proposal
Verify that an email notification is sent and received with correct content
Change user password and observe for alert email
Confirm transactional email is sent on password change alert

title: Admin user management and impact model administration
description: Validate that admin users can create, edit, and delete users and manage impact models with fine-grained permission controls.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to User Management page
Create a new user with specific roles and permissions
Confirm the new user appears in the list with correct roles
Modify the roles and permissions of an existing user
Verify changes persist and affect user access appropriately
Navigate to Impact Models Administration and create or edit impact models
Validate impact models save correctly and access control enforces restrictions
